entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 11 February 2023
